name: Time Jump (itch) (Zeblote)
description:
A unique single-player coop experience with a mild seasoning of time travel.

Move with WASD.
Enter the time machine to jump back to the beginning of the level and play coop with yourself! But beware, only a limited number of timelines can be linked, so you need to make each run count!

Created for the summer 2019 #UE4Jam by:

  • Zeblote
  • Liam
  • ZeroNight
  • Phyronnaz
  • Luna_Rei

While this may seem like a large team, some of us weren't able to work on the project for more than a couple of hours.

Known bugs that unfortunately made it into the jam build (fixed in CL268):

  • In the Tutorial 1 level, the bridge starts extended. Just walk on the button and pretend you didn't see it.
  • In the Select Level dialog, selecting Tutorial 2 opens Tutorial 1. Just walk into the exit to get to Tutorial 2.

Sourced assets used in the submission:

  • Character models and animations: "Modular RPG Heroes Polyart" (Marketplace)
  • Background music: "Desolace - OST" (Marketplace)
  • World Sounds: Obtained through provided Soundly Pro subscription
  • UI Sounds: Obtained through FreeSound

All further models, textures, tools, environments, effects, UI and gameplay have been created by us during the jam.
